Playlistify

A lightweight Python tool that creates .m3u playlist files from Spotify playlist URLs.

Playlistify uses the Spotify Web API to read playlist metadata and outputs a clean .m3u file containing track names in order.

Convert any Spotify playlist URL into an .m3u file

Saves playlists using the original playlist name

Simple one-time credential setup

Credentials stored locally in config.json

No Spotify Premium required
